listedItems: Create a new incident for each emergency
Be clear, intelligible, accurate and detailed
Note down facts - not your own assumptions, comments, opinions or additions
Obtain as much relevant information as possible
If a mistake is realised after the time of writing, inform the Emergency Management Duty Officer/Emergency Control Centre Manager/Deputy Manager as soon as possible.
To record a correction, add a linked entry against the original entry, cross referencing to provide the corrected information.
